comment._content: Certainly can identify young and youthful Mama Maria Nyerere!

comment.author: 67127882@N07
comment._content: Mrs Macleod was the wife of the British Secretary of State for the Colonies, the Rt. Hon. Iain Macleod,MP, visiting Dar es Salaam for the Constitutional Conference in March 1961.
